HotelElement.Name: Chapung SeBali Resort and Spa Ubud

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Chapung SeBali Resort and Spa in Ubud, you'll be close to Botanic Garden Ubud and Ubud Monkey Forest. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Gaya Art Space and Seniwati Gallery of Art by Women.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 8 individually decorated guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Chapung SeBali Resort and Spa. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Chapung SeBali Resort and Spa. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Botanic Garden Ubud - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Gaya Art Space - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Seniwati Gallery of Art by Women - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Neka Art Museum - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Blanco Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Puri Lukisan Museum - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Pura Taman Saraswati - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Ubud Royal Palace - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Ubud Market - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Komaneka Fine Art Gallery - 3.6 km / 2.3 mi
Ubud Monkey Forest - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Pura Dalem Agung Padangtegal - 4.4 km / 2.7 mi
Puser Tasik Temple - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Arma Museum - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Gajah Mas Gallery - 5.7 km / 3.5 mi

The preferred airport for Chapung SeBali Resort and Spa is Denpasar (DPS-Ngurah Rai Intl.) - 31.3 km / 19.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
